name: Strawberry Spinach Salad Breakfast Wrap
author: Culinary Envy
summary: This strawberry spinach breakfast wrap is a yummy, quick, and deliciously refreshing packed-full-of-nutrients morning meal. Perfect healthy alternative! Assemble right before eating.
ingredients: ¼ (16 ounce) package hulled and sliced strawberries
2 slices turkey bacon, cooked and crumbled
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spread walnuts on a baking sheet and toast until fragrant, tossing a couple of times to ensure even browning, 5 to 8 minutes
Combine strawberry slices and coconut sugar in a small bowl
Let stand for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally
Mix together yogurt, lime juice, and honey to make the dressing
Spread the dressing over the lavash bread
Top with spinach, strawberries, bacon, walnuts, and chia seeds
Roll up the wrap and cut in half
